previewArticle.title: New York City FC vs Montreal Impact | MLS Match Preview

recapArticle.title: New York City FC 3, Montreal Impact 1 | MLS Match Recap

timelineItems.desc: A pair of clubs looking to jumpstart a rise up the Eastern Conference table over the second half of the season meet when New York City FC play host to the Montreal Impact on Saturday evening at Yankee Stadium.
timelineItems.title: HIGHLIGHTS: New York City FC vs Montreal Impact | June 13, 2015
